Title: Illuminated Medallion with Table of Contents
Medium: ink and pigments on cream-colored laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.617 contains one of two facing illuminated medallions with the manuscript's table of contents inscribed in compartments.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript;  Iran; Literature -- Poetry; Literature -- Prose
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Sa'di (died 691 AH/AD 1292)
